column4: Breakfast at the Frat: A Time Series Analysis

column1: The data contained in this file includes sales and promotional information from a sampling of stores over 156 weeks, beginning January 2009 through December 2011. These are the sales metrics of products in 4 categories: mouthwash, pretzels, frozen pizza, and boxed cereal, the top 5 products from each of the top 3 brands in each category.

column3: average weekly baskets sold in the store
product was a part of in-store promotional display
(Metropolitan Statistical Area) geographic region with a high core population density and close economic ties throughout the surrounding areas
number of parking spaces in the store parking lot
actual amount charged for the product at shelf
temporary price reduction only (i.e., shelf tag only, product was reduced in price but not on display or in an advertisment)
number of unique purchases (baskets) that included the product
package size or quantity of product
